info.title: FAQs on Exporting API
info.description: The Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) API includes more than 200 commonly asked questions about exporting. The answers provided are from government experts that specialize in unique aspects of trade.

get.description: The Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) API includes more than 200 commonly asked questions about exporting. The answers provided are from government experts that specialize in unique aspects of trade.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Searches for a match within the question and answer fields.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: Returns FAQs based on topic name.  This method allows you to search for multiple topics (plural) separated by commas.

parameters.name: industries
parameters.description: Returns FAQs for a specific controlled industry terms. This method allows you to search for multiple industries (plural) separated by commas.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Returns office locations for a specific country based on ISO alpha-2 country codes. This method allows you to search for multiple countries (plural) separated by commas.

parameters.name: trade_regions
parameters.description: Returns FAQs based on trade region.  This method allows you to search for multiple trade regions separated by commas.

parameters.name: world_regions
parameters.description: Returns FAQs based on world region.  This method allows you to search for multiple world regions separated by commas.

parameters.name: first_published_date
parameters.description: Returns FAQs based on the date they were first published.  Dates are filtered by comparing them against an inclusive range, which must be entered with the following format:  YYYY-mm-dd TO YYYY-mm-dd.  Searching on a single date can be done by entering the same value for the start and end of the range.

parameters.name: last_published_date
parameters.description: Returns FAQs based on the date they were last updated.  Dates are filtered by comparing them against an inclusive range, which must be entered with the following format:  YYYY-mm-dd TO YYYY-mm-dd.  Searching on a single date can be done by entering the same value for the start and end of the range.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the number of results to be returned up to a maximum of 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch. Unless specified the API returns 10 results at a time.

question.description: The question being addressed by the FAQ.

answer.description: The answer portion of the FAQ.

first_published_date.description: The date the FAQ was first published.

last_published_date.description: The date the FAQ was last updated.

url.description: The URL where the published FAQ can be viewed.

industries.description: Industry categories assigned to the FAQ.

topics.description: Topic categories assigned to the FAQ.

trade_regions.description: Trade regions relevent to the FAQ.

world_regions.description: World regions relevent to the FAQ.
